rbp_internal_size.help: Default is the larger of the last 2 sectors or last 14 pages of flash.

internal_base_address.help: If default, base address is set to internal_size bytes before the end of flash.

filesystem.help: Options are default, FAT or LITTLE. If default value the filesystem is chosen by the blockdevice type

blockdevice.help: Options are default, SPIF, DATAFASH, QSPIF, SD or other. If default, the block device will be chosen according to the component defined in targets.json. If other, override get_other_blockdevice() to support block device out of Mbed OS tree.

external_size.help: Size in bytes of the external block device, if default value, the maximum size available is used.

external_base_address.help: The default will set start address to address 0

folder_path.help: Path for the working directory where the FileSystemStore stores the data
